title: 5: Before We Were Strangers
itunes:title: Before We Were Strangers
description: The Readheads are up to two episodes per month during quarantine so we're here with the second episode of April recapping Before We Were Strangers by Renee Carlino. We are discussing all of the major themes and storylines from the book and sharing how the book spoke to us. All of the hosts (and listeners) loved reading this book so recording this podcast was a true pleasure. Enjoy! The next book is Margo's choice part 2 and she chose In Five Years by Rebecca Serle. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com The overall Readheads Rating for Before We Were Strangers is 4.6 stars.
